attributes.action: Offer Bowling up to the Olympics Arbitration for sport, for consideration into being an Olympic Sport
attributes.additional_details: I am a bowler, and recently noticed, that bowling was offered to be included into the olympic games, I think its about time that its given the consideration to become an olympic sport, this is deserved, and if you can't do anything about this please give me some way of contacting the olympics themselves, many thanks.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the International Olympic Committee, Lausanne, Switzerland.
